"スーパーハード受注許可証の所持"

"Bruder is concerned about Aina now that she's accepted the role of instructor. He says that although she may be anxious or uncertain about her new job, her personality makes her an ideal fit for the role. And he wants her to pass on what she's learned to the next generation of ARKS."
